name: Push-up
description: Start in a high plank with hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your chest to the ground, keeping elbows at 45 degrees, then push back up to start.
audioCueText: Push-ups. Lower your chest to the ground and press back up.

name: Pull-up
description: Hang from a bar with palms facing away, shoulder-width apart. Pull yourself up until your chin clears the bar, then lower with control.
audioCueText: Pull-ups. Pull your chin over the bar and lower with control.

name: Barbell Back Squat
description: With a barbell across your upper back, stand feet shoulder-width apart. Sit your hips back and down until thighs are parallel, then drive through your heels to stand.
audioCueText: Barbell squats. Sit back and down, then drive through your heels.

name: Deadlift
description: Stand with feet hip-width, barbell over mid-foot. Hinge at hips, grip the bar, then drive through your feet to stand tall. Reverse to lower.
audioCueText: Deadlifts. Hinge at the hips, grip the bar, and stand tall.

name: Overhead Press
description: Stand with a barbell at shoulder height, palms forward. Press the bar straight overhead until arms are locked, then lower to shoulders.
audioCueText: Overhead press. Press the bar straight up and lock out your arms.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
description: Stand holding dumbbells at your sides, palms forward. Curl the weights toward your shoulders, squeezing at the top, then lower slowly.
audioCueText: Bicep curls. Curl up, squeeze at the top, and lower slowly.

name: Tricep Dip
description: Support yourself on parallel bars with arms straight. Lower your body by bending elbows to 90 degrees, then press back up.
audioCueText: Tricep dips. Lower to 90 degrees and press back up.

name: Bent-Over Row
description: Hinge forward at the hips holding a barbell. Pull the bar to your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together, then lower.
audioCueText: Bent-over rows. Pull to your chest and squeeze your shoulder blades.

name: Lunges
description: Step forward with one foot, lowering your back knee toward the ground. Keep your front knee over your ankle, then push back to standing.
audioCueText: Lunges. Step forward and lower your back knee toward the ground.

name: Plank
description: Hold a straight-arm or forearm plank with your body in a straight line from head to heels. Engage your core and breathe steadily.
audioCueText: Plank hold. Keep your body in a straight line and engage your core.

name: Lateral Raise
description: Stand with dumbbells at your sides. Raise your arms out to the sides until shoulder height, palms facing down, then lower with control.
audioCueText: Lateral raises. Lift your arms to the sides and lower with control.

name: Hip Thrust
description: Sit with upper back against a bench, barbell across hips. Drive through your heels to lift hips until body forms a straight line, squeezing glutes at top.
audioCueText: Hip thrusts. Drive your hips up and squeeze your glutes at the top.

name: Calf Raise
description: Stand on the edge of a step with heels hanging off. Rise up onto your toes as high as possible, then lower your heels below the step.
audioCueText: Calf raises. Rise up on your toes and lower below the step.

name: Russian Twist
description: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly, and hold a weight. Rotate your torso side to side, touching the weight to the ground on each side.
audioCueText: Russian twists. Rotate side to side and touch the weight down.

name: Farmer's Walk
description: Hold heavy dumbbells or kettlebells at your sides. Walk forward with tall posture, shoulders back, core braced, for the prescribed distance or time.
audioCueText: Farmer's walk. Stand tall, brace your core, and walk forward.

name: Running
description: Maintain a steady running pace at a conversational effort. Land with a midfoot strike, keep arms relaxed at 90 degrees, and breathe rhythmically.
audioCueText: Steady-state run. Find your rhythm and keep a conversational pace.

name: Jump Rope
description: Jump with both feet together, rotating the rope with your wrists. Stay on the balls of your feet with soft knees and a slight bounce.
audioCueText: Jump rope. Stay light on your feet and rotate from the wrists.

name: Burpee
description: From standing, drop into a squat, kick feet back to plank, do a push-up, jump feet forward, then explosively jump up with arms overhead.
audioCueText: Burpees. Drop down, push-up, jump up. Keep moving.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Start in a plank position. Drive one knee toward your chest, then quickly switch legs in a running motion while keeping your hips level.
audioCueText: Mountain climbers. Drive your knees in and keep your hips level.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: Stand with feet together, arms at sides. Jump feet out wide while raising arms overhead, then jump back to start.
audioCueText: Jumping jacks. Jump out and in, arms up and down.

name: High Knees
description: Run in place, driving your knees above hip height with each step. Pump your arms and maintain a quick pace.
audioCueText: High knees. Drive your knees up and pump your arms.

name: Battle Ropes
description: Hold one rope end in each hand. Create alternating waves by rapidly raising and lowering your arms while staying in an athletic stance.
audioCueText: Battle ropes. Alternate your arms and keep the waves going.

name: Rowing Machine
description: Sit on the rower, grip the handle. Drive with your legs first, then lean back slightly and pull the handle to your chest. Reverse the motion to return.
audioCueText: Rowing. Legs push first, then lean back and pull.

name: Downward Dog
description: From all fours, lift your hips up and back to form an inverted V. Press your heels toward the ground, straighten your arms, and lengthen your spine.
audioCueText: Downward dog. Press your heels down and lengthen your spine.

name: World's Greatest Stretch
description: Lunge forward, place the same-side hand on the ground, rotate your opposite arm to the sky. Feel the stretch through hip, thoracic spine, and hamstrings.
audioCueText: World's greatest stretch. Lunge deep and rotate to open your chest.

name: Cat-Cow
description: On hands and knees, alternate between arching your back and rounding it. Inhale as you drop your belly and look up, exhale as you round and tuck your chin.
audioCueText: Cat-cow. Arch your back on the inhale, round on the exhale.

name: 90/90 Hip Stretch
description: Sit with one leg in front at 90 degrees and the other behind at 90 degrees. Lean your chest over the front shin to deepen the stretch.
audioCueText: Ninety-ninety hip stretch. Lean forward over your front shin.

name: Thoracic Spine Rotation
description: Lie on your side with knees stacked and bent. Open your top arm across your body, rotating your upper back while keeping knees together.
audioCueText: Thoracic rotation. Open your arm across and rotate through your upper back.

name: Ankle Circles
description: Lift one foot off the ground and slowly rotate your ankle in large circles. Do both directions, then switch feet.
audioCueText: Ankle circles. Slow, controlled circles in each direction.

name: Shoulder Pass-Through
description: Hold a band or dowel with a wide grip. Keeping arms straight, slowly raise it overhead and behind your back, then return.
audioCueText: Shoulder pass-throughs. Arms straight, take the band overhead and behind.

name: Couch Stretch
description: Kneel with one foot on the ground and the other knee against a wall behind you, shin vertical. Squeeze your glutes and push your hips forward.
audioCueText: Couch stretch. Push your hips forward and squeeze your glutes.

name: Foam Roll — IT Band
description: Lie on your side with a foam roller under your outer thigh. Roll slowly from hip to just above the knee, pausing on tender spots for 20-30 seconds.
audioCueText: IT band roll. Move slowly and pause on tender spots.

name: Foam Roll — Thoracic Spine
description: Lie face-up with a foam roller under your upper back. Cross arms over chest and slowly roll from mid-back to upper back.
audioCueText: Thoracic foam roll. Roll slowly through your upper back.

name: Foam Roll — Quads
description: Lie face-down with a foam roller under your thighs. Roll from hip to just above the knee, turning slightly to hit inner and outer quad.
audioCueText: Quad foam roll. Roll from hip to knee, pausing on tight spots.

name: Lacrosse Ball — Glutes
description: Sit on a lacrosse ball positioned under one glute. Roll slowly in small circles, finding trigger points. Apply sustained pressure on tender areas.
audioCueText: Glute release with lacrosse ball. Find the tight spots and breathe into them.

name: Foam Roll — Calves
description: Sit with a foam roller under your calves. Cross one leg over the other for added pressure and roll from ankle to just below the knee.
audioCueText: Calf foam roll. Roll slowly from ankle to knee.

name: Child's Pose
description: Kneel and sit back on your heels, arms extended forward on the ground. Let your forehead rest on the floor and breathe deeply into your back.
audioCueText: Child's pose. Relax into the stretch and breathe deeply.

name: Supine Spinal Twist
description: Lie on your back, pull one knee across your body while keeping shoulders on the ground. Look toward the opposite hand and hold.
audioCueText: Spinal twist. Let gravity pull your knee down and relax.

name: Legs Up the Wall
description: Lie on your back with legs extended straight up a wall. Let your arms rest at your sides and focus on deep, slow breathing.
audioCueText: Legs up the wall. Relax completely and breathe slowly.

name: Pigeon Pose
description: From a plank, bring one knee forward behind your wrist. Extend the other leg behind you. Lower your chest toward the ground for a deep hip stretch.
audioCueText: Pigeon pose. Sink into the stretch and let your hips open.

name: Diaphragmatic Breathing
description: Lie on your back with knees bent. Place one hand on your chest, one on your belly. Breathe deeply so only your belly rises. Exhale slowly.
audioCueText: Belly breathing. Inhale through your nose, fill your belly, exhale slowly.

name: Standing Hamstring Stretch
description: Stand and place one heel on an elevated surface. Keep your leg straight and hinge forward at the hips until you feel a stretch behind your thigh.
audioCueText: Hamstring stretch. Hinge forward with a flat back.

name: Seated Forward Fold
description: Sit with legs extended in front. Reach for your toes, hinging at the hips with a flat back. Hold and breathe into the stretch.
audioCueText: Forward fold. Reach for your toes and breathe into the stretch.

name: Doorway Chest Stretch
description: Stand in a doorway with forearms on the frame at 90 degrees. Step one foot forward and lean in until you feel a stretch across your chest.
audioCueText: Chest stretch. Lean forward through the doorway and open your chest.

name: Figure Four Stretch
description: Lie on your back, cross one ankle over the opposite knee. Pull the bottom leg toward your chest until you feel a deep stretch in the crossed-leg glute.
audioCueText: Figure four stretch. Pull your knee in and feel the stretch in your glute.

name: Neck Stretches
description: Gently tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear toward your shoulder. Hold, then switch sides. Follow with chin tucks and gentle rotations.
audioCueText: Neck stretches. Tilt gently and hold. No forcing.

name: Single-Leg Balance
description: Stand on one foot with a slight knee bend. Hold your arms out for balance. Focus on a fixed point ahead. Progress by closing your eyes.
audioCueText: Single-leg balance. Stand tall, engage your core, find a focal point.

name: BOSU Ball Squat
description: Stand on a BOSU ball dome-side up. Perform a squat while maintaining balance. Keep your core tight and arms out front for counterbalance.
audioCueText: BOSU ball squats. Squat down with control and keep your balance.

name: Warrior III
description: Stand on one leg, hinge forward at the hips and extend your back leg behind you. Arms reach forward. Body forms a T shape.
audioCueText: Warrior three. Hinge forward and extend into a T shape.

name: Bird Dog
description: On hands and knees, extend one arm forward and the opposite leg back simultaneously. Hold briefly, then switch sides. Keep hips level.
audioCueText: Bird dog. Extend opposite arm and leg, keep your hips level.
